Name: Ogre Tomahawk
Properties: Unique Passive Fury: Basic attacks will increase hero's movement speed by 10%

Name: Magic Blade
Properties: Unique - Lifeline: Gains a shield that can absorb 280~700 damage( increase with level) Cooldown of 30seconds

Name: Demon Hunter Sword
Properties: Unique Passive - Devour: Basic attacks will deal 10% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage(up to 60 against monsters).
Unique Passive - Devour: Each basic attack grants 4% health stealing for 4s, up to 3 times.

Name: Deadly Blade
Properties: Unique Passive - Life Drain: Basic attack reduces HP regen effect by 50% for 3s

Name: Corrosion Scythe
Properties: Unique Passive- Corrosion: Basic attacks lower the target's attack speed by 10% and have a 50% chance to reduce the target's movement speed by 35%
Unique Passive - Impulse: Dealing damage with basic attacks increase your physical attack by 2%, up to a maximum of 6%. Lasts for 3s.

Name: Malefic Roar
Properties: Unique Passive- Armor Buster: Basic attack will ignore 20% of a defense turret's defensive armor.

Name: Haas's Claw
Properties: Unique Passive- Insanity: When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive an extra 10% physical lifesteal

Name: Berserker's Fury
Properties: Unique Passive- Doom: Crit strikes will increase one's physical attack by 5% lasting 2 seconds

Name: Endless Battle
Properties: Unique Passive- Divine Justice: After using an ability, the next basic attack will deal additional 70% of physical attack as true damage. This effect has a cooldown of 1.5s.
Unique Passive- Chase Fate: When Divein Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed by 15%

Name: WindTalker
Properties: Unique Passive- Typhoon: After every 4 basic attacks, the next basic attack must deal 125 magic damage to 3 enemies
Unique Passive- Activate: Each time Typhoon is cast, one's movement speed will be increased bt 5% for a short time

Name: Scarlet Phantom
Properties: Unique Passive- Frenzy: Crit strikes will increase the hero's attack speed 25% and crit strike rate 5% lasting 2 seconds.

Name: Blade of the 7 Seas
Properties: Unique Passive- Steamroll: Skills will lower the target's physical defence by 25 points(applied before damage), Lasts for 3 seconds

Name: Blade of Despair
Properties: Unique Passive- Despair: Deals an extra 10% damage to an any in an abnormal state(stunned, Knocked airborne, transformed, disabled)

Name: Hunter Strike
Properties: Unique Passive- Pursuit: Attacks enemy 5 times in a row and improves the hero's movement speed by 30% for 2seconds, this effect has a cooldown of 15seconds.

Name: Bloodlust Axe
Properties: Unique Passive- BloodThirsty: When skills cause damage, heals 20% of damage as HP for the hero.

Name: Rose Gold Meteor
Properties: Lifeline: Gains a shield that can absorb 510~1350 damage( increase with level) with 30 seconds CD

Name: Azure Blade
Properties: Unique Passive - Judgement: After using a skill, the next basic attack deals 50 extra true damage with a cooldown of 1 seconds

Name: Elegant Gem
Properties: Unique Passive- Gift: Regens 20% HP and Mana within 2 s of leveling up.

Name: Enchanted Talisman
Properties: Unique Passive- Mana Spring: Regen 10% total of one's max Mana every 10 seconds

Name: Winter Truncheon
Properties: Unique Passive- Frozen: When own hero's HP drops below 30%, being hit by basic attack will lower target's movement speed by 80% and deal 50% of magic power as magic damage to the target. This effect has a 5seconds cooldown.

Name: Feather of Heaven
Properties: Unique Passive- Affliction: Basic attacks will deal 40% of the hero's AP as additional magic damage.
Unique Passive- Derive: Increases Spell Vamp effect by additional 8%

Name: Disaster Truncheon
Properties: Unique Passive- The Dead: When skills cause damage to target, will reduce 25 pts of magic resistance for the target lasting 5seconds

Name: Necklace of Durance
Properties: Unique Passive- Life Drain: Skill dealing damage to the target reduces the regen effect by 50% for 3 seconds.

Name: Devil's Tears
Properties: Unique Passive- Spellbreaker: When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

Name: Holy Crystal
Properties: Unique Passive- Exterminate: After a skill hits a target, magic attack will immediately increase by 15%. The next skill damage will terminate this effect. This effect can last up to 3seconds with a built in cooldown time of 10 seconds

Name: Concentrated Energy
Properties: Unique Passive- Recharge: Regen 10% of one's HP after killing a hero.

Name: Ice Queen Wand
Properties: Unique Passive- Ice Bound: Skills that damage an enemy hero will carry a 15% slow down effect. This effect lasts 3seconds and can stack up to 2 times

Name: Glowing Wand
Properties: Unique Passive- Scorch: Burns the target for 3seconds when the skills hit, deaing 2%/2.5%/3% of the target's current HP as magic damage, at least 10 pts

Name: Calamity Reaper
Properties: Unique Passive- Calamity: After using a skill, the next basic attack deals extra true damage equal to 120% magic attack with a cooldown of 1.5seconds

Name: Clock of Destiny
Properties: Unique Passive- Time: Adds 30 HP and 5 Magic attack every 30seconds. Up to 10 times
Unique Passive: Reincarnate. If Time is fully stacked, then the hero will receive 5% magic attack and 300 mana

Name: Blood Wings
Properties: Unique Passive- Nirvana: Adds 2 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

Name: Fleeting Time
Properties: Unique Passive- Timestream: After killing an enemy hero, immediately reduces 20% of current reuse time for all abilites

Name: Lightning Truncheon
Properties: Unique Passive- Resonate: Every 6seconds, your next damaging magical ability will proc, maximum of 3 enemies will be hurt by 150% magic power damage

Name: Molten Essence
Properties: Unique Passive - Burning Soul: deals 1% of one's Max HP as magic damage per second to nearby enemies, and deals extra 50% of damage to minions.

Name: Dreadnaught Armor
Properties: Unique Passive - Deter: When an enemy hero attacks, this ability will reduce his/her attack power by 4%. This effect lasts 2s and can stack up to 3 times

Name: Courage Bulwark
Properties: Unique Passive- Bravery: Increases 10% of attack power and defense for nearby allies.
Unique Passive- Heavy Armor: Nearby soldiers can take more defense turret damage

Name: Blade Armor
Properties: Unique Passive- Counterstrike: Deals 25% of opponent's physical attack as physical damage to an attacker when a basic attack is received

Name: Wings of Apocalypse Queen
Properties: Unique Passive- Demonize: Increases physical and magic defense 40% and physical lifesteal by 15% when HP drops below 40%.

Name: Thunder Belt
Properties: Unique Passive- Thunderbolt: After you use a skill, the next basic attack will carry an extra 40% of physical attacks as true damage, and slow the target and surrounding enemy units, lasts 1.5 seconds. Effect can only be used once every 1.5sconds.

Name: Cursed Helmet
Properties: Unique Passive- Burning Soul: Deals 1.5% of one's max HP as magic damage per second to nearby enemies, and deals extra 50% damage to minions.

Name: Bloodthirsty King
Properties: Unique Passive- Bloodlust: A kill or assist regends 20% of hero's HP within 5seconds. 10seconds cooldown

Name: Demon's Advent
Properties: Unique Passive- Deter: When an enemy hero attacks, this ability will reduce his/her attack power by 6%. This effect lasts for 2 seconds and can stack up to 3 times.

Name: Oracle
Properties: Unique Passive- Scream: Within 4s after being attacked, the hero will regen 8% HP. This effect has a 6seconds cooldown time.

Name: Athena's Shield
Properties: Unique Passive- Refuge: Get a damage-absorbing shield every 30seconds, Shield absorption amount grows as the match goes on, maxing out at 1150

Name: Dominance Ice
Properties: Unique Passive- Artic Cold: Lowers movement speed by 5% and lowers attack speed by 30% for nearby enemy heroes.

Name: Immortality
Properties: Unique Passive Immortal: Resurrect 2seconds after dying and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 pts of damage, Shield lasts for 3 seconds. Cooldown for this effect is 180seconds

Name: Brute Force Breastplate
Properties: Unique Passive- Brute Force: Attacking an enemy will increase one's capabilites, increasing movement speed by 2% and physical attack by 3%. This effect last 4seconds and can stack up to 4 times.

Name: Ancient Ghostatue
Properties: Unique Passive- Runner: On leaving combat movement speed will increase by 60

Name: Warrior Boots
Properties: Unique Passive- Valor: Physical defense will go up by 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points, lasting 3seconds.

Name: Tough Boots
Properties: Unique Passive- Fortitude: Reduces time controlled 25%

Name: Wizard Boots
Properties: Unique Passive- Plunder: 80 gold will be awaded for assists.

Name: Boots of Tranquility
Properties: Unique Passive- Bless: HP regen effect increased by 10%

Name: Hunter's Knife
Properties: Unique Passive - Greed: Get Extra 15% exp when jungling

Name: Curse Sword
Properties: Unique Passive - Avarice: Get an extra 30% when jungling, regain 4% of maximum health and 10% of Mana after monster kill.
Unique passive - Warding Wind: Slaying Jungle Monsters increases one's movement speed by 8%. Lasts 30s.

Unique Passive: Makes the battle spell retribution applicable to heroes: Reduces target's movement speed by 70%( The effect will decay within 3s) and reduces target's Magic Resistance. Buying other advance jungle gear will disable this effect

Properties: Unique Passive - Avarice: Get an extra 30% when jungling. Regain 4% of maximum health and 10% of Mana after monster kill.

Unique Passive: Makes the battle spell retribution applicable to heroes: Reduces target's movement speed by 70%( The effect will decay within 3s) and and within a short period of time receive a shield that scales off maximum health. Buying other advance jungle gear will disable this effect
